points.text: Full stack web app featuring secure user authentication
Allows users to create, host, and export their own simple website
Automated system for assembling, linking, and executing MASM32 programs
REST API created to serve data related to the University of Windsor
Serves course, staff and building data
Web interface to authenticate UWindsor students and add them to a Discord server
Uses OAuth2 to prevent professors, staff, and non-students from joining
Created using Python, Flask, SQLAlchemy, and OAuth2
